channel.title: CVE Feed for themastercut -- Revision Manager TMC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for themastercut -- Revision Manager TMC

item.title: CVE-2024-7622|2024-09-06T13:55:14.025Z -- themastercut -- revision%20manager%20tmc
item.description: The Revision Manager TMC plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized arbitrary email sending due to a missing capability check on the _a_ajaxQuickEmailTestCallback() function in all versions up to, and including, 2.8.19. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send emails with arbitrary content to any individual through the vulnerable web server.
